column3: I'd use "configure flags" not "compiler flags", to avoid confusion with CFLAGS/CXXFLAGS\n
`./configure --help` is somehow unrelated to compiling bitcoin. No strong opinion though.\n

> ./configure --help is somehow unrelated to compiling bitcoin. No strong opinion though.

Some other configure options are explicitly listed in the build instructions. I don't think it hurts to tell that there may be other options available than those.
